name: nichole b
text: I had been hiking most of the day so I hadn't eaten a meal since morning.  We stopped at the casino on our way back from the grand canyon.  My expectations were low with a food court restaurant but we were hungry.  And, I  had the munchies. …More

name: Dottie Mccurdy
text: I am in love with this place. The pizza is  made fresh, with fresh ingredients and nice thin crust.

name: Mrs C.
text: My sister took me here for a quick bite to eat while visiting from Colorado. I have to say, I was a little skeptical at first but all skepticism was put aside when we met Leslie! Leslie had impeccable customer service skills and she made …More

name: Madhat
text: Tasty pizza for a modest price, pizza by slice or if your with a group get the family deal

name: Scott Williams
text: Food court pizza that's been sitting under a heat lamp for hours.
